articles.title: Devendra Fadnavis inspires industry at COMP-EX’ 2026
articles.description: the second day of comp-ex’ 2026, central india’s flagship it exhibition, was marked by the visit of chief minister of maharashtra devendra fadnavis, who addressed a packed audience comprising it professionals, entrepreneurs, msmes, startups, students, and industry leaders. addressing the gathering, the chief minister highlighted maharashtra’s remarkable progress on the technology front and proudly stated that the state has emerged as india’s no. 1 destination for data centres, with nearly 60% of the country

articles.title: US stocks soar to best day since May as Dow tops 50K
articles.description: NEW YORK — The U.S. stock market roared back on Friday, as technology stocks recovered much of their losses from earlier in the week and bitcoin halted its plunge, at least for now. The S&P 500 rallied 2% for its best day since May. The Dow Jones Industrial Average soared 1,206 points, or 2.5%, and […]
articles.content:
NEW YORK — The U.S. stock market roared back on Friday, as technology stocks recovered much of their losses from earlier in the week and bitcoin halted its plunge, at least for now.

articles.title: Donald Trump Reacts to Dow Topping 50,000 for First Time Ever
articles.description: President Donald Trump reacted after U.S. stocks surged Friday, pushing the Dow past 50,000 as technology shares powered a market rebound.
articles.content:
President Donald Trump spoke out after the U.S. stock market roared back on Friday, as technology stocks recovered much of their losses from earlier in the week and bitcoin halted its plunge, at least for now.
The S&P 500 rising 2% for its biggest ga... [1094 chars]

articles.title: Correction: Astanza Laser Appointed Sole Distributor for Dermalosophy USA Professional Skincare
articles.description: Dallas, Feb. 06, 2026 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Astanza Laser, an award-winning and trusted provider of aesthetic laser technology, service, marketing support, and training, has been appointed the exclusive U.S. distributor for Dermalosophy, a professional dermocosmetics brand praised by skincare experts, aesthetic physicians, and wellness clinics worldwide. Founded, formulated, and manufactured in Israel, Dermalosophy is a professional skincare line rooted in skin health science, delivering clinically driven formulations engineered to support comprehensive, results-oriented treatment plans.

articles.title: Dow crosses 50,000 for first time as stocks enjoy strongest day since May 2025
articles.description: Resurgent technology stocks drove the rebound after a volatile week, while bitcoin also recouped losses.
articles.content:
The U.S. stock market roared back on Friday, as technology stocks recovered much of their losses from earlier in the week and bitcoin halted its plunge.
